## QualifierType.isPotentialMatch() method

Determines if a supplied condition value is a potential match for a possible context value.

**Signature:**

```typescript
isPotentialMatch(conditionValue: string, contextValue: string): boolean;
```

## Parameters

</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description

</td><td>

string


</td><td>

The condition value.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

contextValue


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

The context value.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

boolean

`true` if the condition value is a potential match for the context value, `false` otherwise.
